scripts.start: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/bot.js --log-to-file --production
scripts.start:dev: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/bot.js | pino-pretty -i pid,hostname -t yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:ss
scripts.start:publish: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/bot.js --publish-commands
scripts.start:clear: npm run clean && tsc --project tsconfig.json && node dist/bot.js --clear-commands
